body_html:
@JaosonMa use workspace.SwitchWorkspace("default") , example:

workspace.ResetWorkspace()
workspace.SwitchWorkspace("net 1", True)
workspace.RunNetOnce(self.init_net)
self._create_input_blobs_for_net(self.net)
workspace.CreateNet(self.net)

workspace.SwitchWorkspace("net 2", True)
workspace.RunNetOnce(self.init_net)
self._create_input_blobs_for_net(self.net)
workspace.CreateNet(self.net)

then switch workspaces to run each one:

workspace.SwitchWorkspace("net 1")
workspace.RunNet()
workspace.SwitchWorkspace("net 2")
workspace.RunNet()

body:
@JaosonMa use `workspace.SwitchWorkspace("default")` , example: 

```python
workspace.ResetWorkspace()
workspace.SwitchWorkspace("net 1", True)
workspace.RunNetOnce(self.init_net)
self._create_input_blobs_for_net(self.net)
workspace.CreateNet(self.net)

workspace.SwitchWorkspace("net 2", True)
workspace.RunNetOnce(self.init_net)
self._create_input_blobs_for_net(self.net)
workspace.CreateNet(self.net)
```

then switch workspaces to run each one: 
```python
workspace.SwitchWorkspace("net 1")
workspace.RunNet()
workspace.SwitchWorkspace("net 2")
workspace.RunNet()
```
